title: Fuck Master Yi
body: He is so god damn impossible to kill 1v1 unless you are a tank its stupid because you can't slow him, can't hit him and he does MASSIVE damage with the ability to take next to no damage. I caught him with no MR as ahri, had a full combo, 2 full ult hits and he just ate the damage. I caught him completely blind and he just RAPED me and I was fed. I hit every ability and ignited and he walked out with 1/4 HP. Hes fucking broken as fuck.

replies.body:
reason you died:  assassin versus a mage...  all he needs is to get into range and you die

yi is a very strong hypercarry, but he is also very vulnerable to crowd control and very situational

hes specifically made to kill noobs who falsely think they have "caught him"

tho some very strong duelists can actually beat him 1v1, like nocturne and shyvana. tho yes, a master yi is not a champion you should fight 1on1 if you play a weak to medium duelist like ahri.
To be honest, the only champion that I think it is able to 1x1 Yi is Jax, even Shyvana would have problems taking Yi's sustained damage for long, and Nocturne definitively has problems.
nocturne owns him easy, shyvana wins barely, jax has no chance.
Jax would slaughter Yi. Most of Yi's damage comes from autos which Jax negates.

sure if you have no brain. if you have some, you can force his counterstrike before using your E and run away. once he leaps towards you to stun you, alphastrike him to avoid the stun or at least try to. after the stun wears off or you dodged it, pop E and destroy him. nothing jax can do.
Master Yi runs on the Stun and Done philosophy. Granted, any fed champion can be hard to kill 1 v 1.
Pure ap amumu burst.  Ult stops you from attacking LOL
Learn how to bait his attacks then eat him.
Shyvana mid to late game would win against a Yi in her current form right now, she's an extremely powerful duelist, BOTRK with her percentile health damage is pretty massive damage.
id like to point out that he could have mitigated some of your damage by using his W since it gives him damage reduction.
what? was he fed?? did you have zhonyas?? why were you 1v1ing yi??
Theres no way you landed your full combo + Ignite as a fed Ahri and failed to kill Yi lol

yes there is. ahris burst doesnt kill in one second so if her charm wears off, he can then block some of the remaining damage with his W and if he survives with 100 health, ahri has to auto attack him 3 times to kill him or so but yi will just kill her in 1 second
